text_block_list.text: Annual summer camp. Today, I had half a day free. This is because I have a plan to carry out.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Nature watching, is it? I'm not very familiar with area around here……
First, I will take her to a mountain forest. We will admire the flora and fauna, and then follow a mountain stream to the beach. I need to make sure she has a safe and enjoyable time!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: There are so many kinds of plants around here.…… The air is good too. It might be perfect for relaxation.
choice_data_list: Suddenly, a problem! What kind of tree is this!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: What, this tree with blue berries?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Let's see……… Oh, that's a persimmon, I think!
choice_data_list: Great answer! You know your stuff.
Great answer! You know your stuff.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ehehe. But I'm not too familiar with them, and I'm glad I got to see them today…… ! Persimmon trees don't grow naturally in Hokkaido.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… I see, it's about time for the berries to start growing already. They turn a beautiful orange in the fall.…… Hmmm, interesting.
Hokko Tarumae observes a persimmon tree with twinkling eyes. She seems completely enthralled by this unfamiliar plant!
Next is the area along the mountain stream. I've heard that there are many opportunities for animal and bird sightings in this area……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ― Oh, I just heard a bird singing…… I think it's that one, such a beautiful blue color ……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Oh, really! I see, they're around here too……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: They're in Hokkaido, but they're so rare! All I could hear was their voices……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: It's not often you get to see them so clearly! Let's take a picture of it, since we're here……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Wow! Look at that! The little birds are flying out of their nests…

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ah―!…… That one doesn't seem to fly well.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ah Trainer-san, this way is―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Some mountain plants are dangerous to touch. There are even poisonous insects.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Of course, you can't just pick it and bring it home ……! From an ecosystem protection standpoint, It should never be done!
『I'm sorry! I was rash!』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ………… uh, umm………… that ……
choice_data_list: Let's pray and watch for them to fly away on their own.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: What?…… Oh…… yes!
The two of us watch quietly and patiently. The bird, which had been struggling for some time―
(Chirp―, piii!)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ―They did it! it could fly!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Yes, it was really good……! ―ehehe, this is nature at its best, isn't it?
We came off the mountain road and onto the beach. Lastly, it will take us to――

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I didn't know there was a cave like this ……! I trained on the beach every day and never noticed it.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Wow, it's pitch black……! In times like this, you have to wait for your eyes to adjust―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Caves are quite cool and chilly, aren't they? The ground is bumpy too……!
choice_data_list: There's a step there, so be careful.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Yes, thank you……! Oh, there's a turn ahead, isn't there? There we go…

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ―Wow!…… amazing, it looks like a starry sky……!
It is said that the reflection of the sun's rays and the shape of the stalactites are responsible for this spectacular view.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I mean, it's natural.…… It's really amazing……! It's fantastic, it's like it's not real…… It's just extraordinary.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ―ahaha, I've grown to love the nature here.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: It's full of things I've never seen before, yet somehow familiar and…… very interesting!
choice_data_list: That's good to hear. Great success!
Well, good for you, that's a huge success!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Eh ……?
In fact, today's nature-watching event was a presentation of a project to Hokko Tarumae.
She gave me this advice while I was planning a plan to attract more visitors to Tomakomai. From there, I came up with the idea of organizing the event on our own.
She will guide people through the nature of Tomakomai, which is full of attractions. It is sure to be a safe and educational tour.
If you provide a great nature experience with perfect guidance…… everyone will become a fan of Tomakomai. Just like she is now!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Trainer ……
『I was impressed, and I even learned a lot.』

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (That's right… trainers are always so positive and accepting―)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ―Let's do it! Nature watching event. And if we're going to do it, let's make it a perfect event!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: We also need to enlist the help of the locals and make sure we have enough guides……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Also, we need to make a guidebook for our guests! We need to provide advance information on necessary equipment, basic precautions, advanced preparation is essential.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Yes!!! ―ehehe, Trainer is amazing.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: No matter what I say…… you always take it head on and see it in a positive light.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Even if I overthink things or say harsh things. You make it all…… good, and make it shine beautifully. So―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: With the trainer, I can be as I am…… and feel that it's okay to remain serious.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ―hehehe. I'll do my best in both the race and locodol, seriously! Trainers, please be serious with me, too, okay?
I feel as if our hearts are once again united, and I want to savor this time a little longer.
choice_data_list: A little more ― let's just keep watching this.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ―No, let's go home! High tide is coming, and it's getting more and more dangerous!
……After all, safety comes first here! We walked briskly along the beach so that we could return home before the tide rose.
